documentation.text: @notice An event emitted when the governance proposal is created
@notice An event emitted when the crowd proposal is terminated
@notice An event emitted when delegated votes are transfered to the governance proposal

params.calldatas_: The ordered list of calldata to be passed to each call
params.description_: The block at which voting begins: holders must delegate their votes prior to this block
params.signatures_: The ordered list of function signatures to be called
params.targets_: The ordered list of target addresses for calls to be made
params.values_: The ordered list of values (i.e. msg.value) to be passed to the calls to be made

terminate().notice: Terminate the crowd proposal, send back staked Mpoint tokens

vote().notice: Vote for the governance proposal with all delegated votes
